div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 07:54 am CDT

div.span: Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Windy, with a north northwest wind 23 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 42. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 6 to 11 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 31 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 75. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the morning.
